edu.stanford.nlp.simple

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.simple.Token
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractToken, HasContext, HasIndex, HasLemma, HasNER, HasOffset, HasOriginalText, HasTag, HasWord, Serializable

    public class Token
extends Object
implements AbstractToken
    A utility class for representing a token in the Simple API. This nominally tries to conform to a CoreLabel-like interface, though many of the methods are not supported (most notably, the setters).
    Author:
    Gabor Angeli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • sentence

        public final Sentence sentence
        The underlying sentence supplying the fields for this token.

      • index

        public final int index
        The index of this token in the underlying sentence. This can be out of bounds; the sentence is assumed to be infinitely padded.
